parameters.name: TrackerName
parameters.description: The name of the tracker resource.

nested_items.name: TrackerName
nested_items.description: The name of the tracker resource.

nested_items.name: TrackerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the tracker resource. Used when you need to specify a resource across all Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The optional description for the tracker resource.

nested_items.name: PricingPlanDataSource
nested_items.description: No longer used. Always returns an empty string.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the tracker resource was created in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the tracker resource was last updated in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: A key identifier for an Amazon Web Services KMS customer managed key assigned to the Amazon Location resource.

nested_items.name: PositionFiltering
nested_items.description: The position filtering method of the tracker resource.

nested_items.name: EventBridgeEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether UPDATE events from this tracker in EventBridge are enabled. If set to true these events will be sent to EventBridge.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyEnableGeospatialQueries
nested_items.description: Enables GeospatialQueries for a tracker that uses a Amazon Web Services KMS customer managed key.
